CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Account_Payable_Email__c ) || ISBLANK( Account__r.Credit_Control_Reminder_Email__c ), "", IF( Account_Payable_Email__c = Account__r.Credit_Control_Reminder_Email__c, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + Account__r.Credit_Control_Reminder_Email__c ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - Account Payable Email
